VRDisplayCapabilitiesMaxLayers.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The maxLayers read-only property of the interface returns a number indicating the maximum number of s that the VR display can present at once (e.g. the maximum length of the array that can accept.)

blockquote.para: Note: This property was part of the old WebVR API. It has been superseded by the WebXR Device API.
